element.hint: If this field is empty, the url will be the default form view for the associated table
element.label: Creator url
element.name: creator_url

element.hint: If provided, the Editor url will be based on this field and the Table name field
element.label: Editor form view
element.name: form_view

element.hint: If no icon (.svg format) is provided, the icon will fall back to the associated Taxonomy Category's icon (if no icon is present there, a default icon will be used)
element.label: Icon
element.name: icon

element.hint: Override the objects standard name using a script
element.label: Name override
element.name: name_override

element.hint: Check this box to override the object's standard name using a script
element.label: Override name
element.name: override_name

element.hint: Table label will be used to surface the type of object in App Engine Studio
element.label: Table name
element.name: table

element.hint: Table name to override label defined in type of App Engine Studio
element.label: Table name override
element.name: table_name_override

element.hint: If unchecked, the description of this taxonomy type will be pulled from sys_documentation
element.label: Use description
element.name: use_description
